Interface VirtualServerSocket

All Superinterfaces:
Remote, VirtualServer
All Known Implementing Classes:
SocketServerHandler
public interface VirtualServerSocket extends VirtualServer
Extends the VirtualServer interface for Socket-based communication. Currently, it inherits all general server functionalities defined in VirtualServer.
